title: [GAMEPLAY] Quinn passive not proccing on heartseeker skin
body:
When using heartseeker skin there are times that when the passive procs and you auto it doesn't pop the passive. Sometimes it's just when you auto right after the proc which could be a timing thing, but I found when being exhaust on a q -> auto -> auto, which quin I was unable to proc the passive on the enemy.

E the victim
auto the passive to proc
Q the victim
attempt to auto again

replies.body: Heya! This isn't something that I'm able to repro on my end, would you happen to have a video? :)
